Headline: #J14 Jeffery Jump Temporary Reroute near Jeffery/73rd
ShortDescription: J14 Jeffery Jump buses are rerouted in both directions: due to street blockage near Jeffery/73rd.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#J14 Jeffery Jump buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions: 

Northbound via Jeffery, 73rd, Yates, 71st, Jeffery, and resume normal route.
Southbound via Jeffery, 67th, Stony Island, 73rd, Jeffery and resume normal route due to street blockage near Jeffery/73rd.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #93 California/Dodge Temporary Reroute at California/Peterson
ShortDescription: 93 California/Dodge buses are rerouted in both directions via California, Lincoln, Peterson over normal route on California.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#93 California/Dodge buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via California, Lincoln, Peterson, over normal route on California, due to street blockage near California/Peterson.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #70 Division Temporary Westbound Reroute near Division/Kolmar
ShortDescription: Westbound #70 Division buses are temporarily rerouted via Division, Kostner, Chicago, Cicero and Division, due to street blockage near Division/Kolmar.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Westbound #70 Division buses are temporarily rerouted via Division, Kostner, Chicago, Cicero and Division, then resume their normal route, due to street blockage near Division/Kolmar.

Eastbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
